scripts.democontent: teardown-database && sudo rimraf ./database && npm run -s setup-database -- --persistant && sleep 3 && democontent
scripts.test: teardown-database && setup-database && npm run -s build && cp ormconfig.test.json dist/ormconfig.json && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --colors --bail --timeout 60000 --recursive dist/tests && teardown-database
scripts.test:ci: teardown-database && setup-database && npm run -s build && cp ormconfig.test.json dist/ormconfig.json && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --colors --bail --timeout 60000 --recursive dist/tests && teardown-database

hooks.pre-push: npm run -s lint && npm run -s build && rm -R dist && npm run -s test
